name.japanese: サンシャインスマッシャー

description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Solgaleo,
attacks the target with full force. This move can
ignore the effect of the target’s Ability.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Solgaleo,
attacks the target with full force. This move can
ignore the effect of the target’s Ability.
description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Other Pokémon's abilities cannot activate in response to this move.  In particular, it hits through disguise
